allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Initial HOOLIGANS Guild Loot Council Platform

- Next.js 15 monorepo with pnpm workspaces
- Prisma schema for players, items, loot, attendance, BiS tracking
- Dark WoW-themed UI with TailwindCSS + shadcn/ui
- Dashboard with guild stats and recent loot
- Roster management with player cards
- Discord OAuth authentication setup
- Railway deployment configuration

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Allow Prisma build scripts for proper database client generation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Add db:push to build to create database tables

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add guild branding to login page

- Background image with Big League Hooligans banner
- HOOLIGANS moose skull logo
- Semi-transparent card with backdrop blur

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Move db:push to start command for DATABASE_URL access

DATABASE_URL not available during build phase on Railway

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(railway run npx prisma db push:*)
Bash(railway run npx prisma@6.19.1 db push:*)
